00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RActuaData"
00022 
00023 #include "ractuadata.h"
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00026 
00027     RDK2_FACTORY(RActuaData);
00028     
00029     using namespace RDK2::SensorData;
00030     using namespace std;
00031     using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00032     
00033     void RActuaData::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00034     {
00035         r->startReading(getClassName());
00036             timestamp= r->read_f32();
00037             ipc_timestamp = r->read_f32();
00038             tag = r->readString();
00039             ipc_hostname = r->readString();
00040             odometryPose.x = r->read_f32();
00041             odometryPose.y = r->read_f32();
00042             odometryPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00043             estimatedPose.x = r->read_f32();
00044             estimatedPose.y = r->read_f32();
00045             estimatedPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00046             accX = r->read_f32();
00047             accY = r->read_f32();
00048         r->doneReading();
00049     }
00050     
00051     void RActuaData::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00052     {
00053         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00054             w->write_f32(timestamp.getSeconds());
00055             w->write_f32(ipc_timestamp.getSeconds());
00056             w->writeString(tag);
00057             w->writeString(ipc_hostname);
00058             w->write_f32(odometryPose.x);
00059             w->write_f32(odometryPose.y);
00060             w->write_f32(odometryPose.theta);
00061             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.x);
00062             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.y);
00063             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.theta);
00064             w->write_f32(accX);
00065             w->write_f32(accY);
00066         w->doneWriting();
00067     }
00068 
00069     string RActuaData::getLogLine() const {
00070         ostringstream oss;
00071         oss << logtag
00072             << accX << " " << accY << " "
00073             << odometryPose.x << " " << odometryPose.y << " " << odometryPose.theta << " "
00074             << estimatedPose.x << " " << estimatedPose.y << " " << estimatedPose.theta << " "
00075             << timestamp.getMsFromMidnight() << " "
00076             << ipc_timestamp.getMsFromMidnight() << " "
00077             << ipc_hostname << " " << tag;
00078         return oss.str();
00079     }
00080 
00081     bool RActuaData::loadFromLogLine(cstr line) {
00082         istringstream iss(line);
00083         string name;
00084         iss >> name;
00085         if (name != logtag) {
00086             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Error, the first token must be ACTUA");
00087             return false;
00088         }
00089         iss >> accX >> accY;
00090         iss >> odometryPose.x >> odometryPose.y >> odometryPose.theta;
00091         iss >> estimatedPose.x >> estimatedPose.y >> estimatedPose.theta;
00092         unsigned long a;
00093         iss >> a >> a;  // XXX
00094         timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(a);
00095         ipc_timestamp = timestamp;
00096         iss >> ipc_hostname >> tag;
00097         return true;
00098     }
